term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - inversion height in atmospheric chemistry
term.title: inversion height

item.text: The height above ground level at which there is change in sign of the normal temperature 'lapse rate', dT/dz (the rate of change of the temperature with height). Several temperature inversions may be present in the air over a given site at different altitudes as result of various meteorological factors.
